title: Hiking Activity Book for Kids: 35 Fun Projects for Your Next Outdoor Adventure
features: Make every hike an exciting adventure with these outdoor activities for kids ages 6 to 9

Hiking is an amazing way for kids to explore the great outdoors and learn new things about the world around them. This book is filled with 35 hands-on hiking projects that encourage kids to get outside, gain important skills, and discover all the awesome lessons nature can teach them.
What sets this activity book about hiking for kids apart:
Perfect for any hike—It doesn’t matter where in the country you live; these activities are perfect for any hiking trail, walking path, or sidewalk in the U.S.
—It doesn’t matter where in the country you live; these activities are perfect for any hiking trail, walking path, or sidewalk in the U.S.
All sorts of activities—From identifying animal tracks to designing a nature maze, kids will explore a variety of games and exercises that make it even more fun to spend time outdoors.
—From identifying animal tracks to designing a nature maze, kids will explore a variety of games and exercises that make it even more fun to spend time outdoors.
Room to record adventures—Kids will find plenty of space to log details about their favorite trips and sketch what they saw during their hikes.
—Kids will find plenty of space to log details about their favorite trips and sketch what they saw during their hikes.
Inspire kids to hit the trails with this engaging collection of hiking activities that combine learning and play.
description: The Hiking Activity Book for Kids
is a great resource for getting young would-be adventurers out on a hike, and helping them be present and engaged in their surroundings while having a ton of fun.”
—Jenny Golding, founding editor of A Yellowstone Life

“Making the outdoors accessible for kids to enjoy, this book introduces games and activities that will have them begging to go hiking. The colorful pages clearly lay out your next adventure and has options for every situation.”
—Jilane Truax, host of The Outdoor Parent Podcast

“Getting kids motivated and excited for a hike is not always as easy as it seems. Amelia Mayer has created a fun and engaging activity book to get your kids stoked for hitting the trail. This simple activity book takes kids through the prep work of creating a first aid kit and choosing a trail. The second half of the book includes games and activities that children can lead throughout the hike. This hiking companion is sure to get your kids motivated to hike!”
grew up hiking the mountains of Alaska and wants to pass her passion on to kids around the world. Find Amelia’s other books—
